portal.storage.storageForm.deleteModal.c: Please confirm by writing 'delete' below, and pressing the delete button. This Storage will be removed from UDN immediately.
portal.storage.storageForm.name.validati: Storage Name is invalid. Only alphanumeric lowercase letters are allowed.

portal.storage.storageForm.estimate.vali: Estimated Usage must be an integer number and be greater than 0
portal.storage.storageForm.abr.label: Enable ABR Workflow
portal.storage.storageForm.locations.hel: By selecting a location the user is opting for the ingest point to use that location as the storage point. By selecting multiple locations the user is opting to utilize our geo-replication service to ingest copies of the content in multiple locations.
portal.storage.storageForm.estimate.help: By setting this value the user will be able to track their actual usage against their estimated usage across the UDN portal in analytics. The value entered here doesn't serve as a quota or a cap for actual usage.
portal.storage.storageForm.abrProfile.he: The user must enable ABR workflow to utilize one of our preset workflows to transform their content upon ingest.
